name: Local SSH
shortDescription: Allow apps like iSSH and Prompt to SSH into 127.0.0.1 by changing the SSH Port from 22 to 50022.
author: CODYQX4

users.issues: Installs but it does not appear to create a path to “LocalHost”, tried with several SSH apps from the App Store set it up with the proper port number, was always presented with an error message “broken pipe“. Needs to be looked at for iOS 11.3.1, last working iOS for me was 9.3.3
